body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       Parkway headquarters is located at 700 George Washington Memorial Parkway, McLean, Virginia. The headquarters building is open from 8:15 am to 4:15 pm on weekdays. Parkway maintenance is located at 2700 George Washington Memorial Parkway, Alexandria, Virginia. The maintenance building is open from 6:15 am to 3:15 pm on weekdays. The US Park Police District 2 station is located at 700 George Washington Memorial Parkway, McLean, Virginia. The telephone number for US Park Police Dispatch is 202‑610‑7500. To reach the District 2 station, please call 703‑285‑1000. Alexcy Romero, Superintendent 703‑289‑2500 Blanca Stransky, Deputy Superintendent 703‑289‑2500 Roland Rollinger, Acting Administrative Officer  703‑289‑2521 Jason Newman, Chief of Lands, Planning, and Design 703‑289‑2515 Simone Monteleone, Chief of Resource Management 703-289-2512 Lee Werst, Chief of Visitor Services 703‑289‑2531 Tony Migliaccio, Chief of Maintenance 703‑419‑6419
title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Our Staff & Offices
